actionTemplate.title: Blush for Inverted Triangle Face
steps: Begin slightly outside the apple and avoid the sides of the nose
Sweep along the cheekbone toward the temple
Blend upward to prevent droopiness or a harsh look
Buff off excess powder with a clean brush

rationaleTemplate: Moves visual focus upward to balance a narrow chin and wide upper face.
A lifted angle makes the face look fresher and brighter.
